description: Proposed two-story rear extension to existing residential property including kitchen extension and additional bedroom above

comments.content: I strongly support this extension proposal. The design looks well thought out and will enhance the property without affecting our light or privacy.
comments.officerNotes: Updated during QA review - test note

comments.content: I have concerns about the height of the proposed extension. It may block natural light to our rear garden and kitchen window during afternoon hours.
comments.officerNotes: Follow up on light impact assessment needed

comments.content: The extension appears reasonable in size and design. No objections from our household as long as building work hours are reasonable.
Excellent proposal that will improve the street appearance. The materials specified match the existing building perfectly.
While I don't object to home improvements, I'm concerned about the potential noise during construction affecting my home office work.
This extension is completely inappropriate for the area and will overshadow our property. The scale is far too large for the plot size.
The proposed extension looks well-designed and proportional to the existing house. Should enhance property values in the area.
No strong feelings either way. The extension seems standard for this type of property and area.
I object to this proposal due to concerns about drainage and surface water runoff affecting neighboring properties during heavy rain.
Great to see investment in the area. The extension design is tasteful and should set a good precedent for other improvements.
The proposal is acceptable in principle but I would like assurance that party wall procedures will be followed properly.
This extension will completely ruin the character of our Victorian terraced street. The modern design is totally out of keeping.
I fully support this application. The family clearly needs more space and the extension is well-proportioned and sensitively designed.
The application seems reasonable but I would appreciate confirmation about construction vehicle access and parking arrangements.
Strongly object to this overdevelopment. The site coverage will be excessive and contrary to local planning policies on garden land.
comments.officerNotes: Site coverage calculation and policy compliance check required

comments.content: The extension will improve the appearance of the property and the street. The proposed materials are appropriate for the conservation area.
Concerned about the loss of privacy to our rear garden. The proposed first floor windows will directly overlook our private outdoor space.
comments.officerNotes: Privacy screening condition may be required

comments.content: The proposal appears well-considered and should not significantly impact neighboring properties. The design respects the local character.
No objections to the principle of the extension, but request that construction hours are limited to prevent disruption to our young children.
I am concerned about the impact on parking in the street. The extended property may encourage more vehicles and there is already limited parking.
Excellent proposal that will enhance the property whilst maintaining the Victorian character of our street. Fully support this application.
The extension is acceptable in size but I would like confirmation that roof water will be properly managed to prevent flooding of adjacent properties.
This extension is far too large for the plot and will create a precedent for over-development in our area. The bulk and mass are excessive.
The proposed extension appears well-designed and proportionate. It should enhance the property without adversely affecting the neighborhood.
The application documentation seems thorough and the proposal is reasonable. I have no objections to this development.
I object due to the potential noise and disturbance during construction. My elderly mother lives with us and is sensitive to noise pollution.
As a resident of the adjacent street, I support this thoughtful extension. The design maintains the character of the area while providing needed family space.
The extension appears appropriate and should not significantly impact the wider neighborhood. The architectural style is compatible with local buildings.
